title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A caring yet inspiring tone convinces people to listen to your ideas. Others are likely receptive because they see that you value and appreciate their contributions toward a common purpose. Similarly, youre motivated to influence your allies, especially if theres a goal you badly want to reach. Thankfully, you can gain momentum when your efforts are supported by your colleagues as persuasive Mercury positively aligns with fascinating Neptune in your 10th House of Authority. Author Ken Blanchard wrote, None of us is as smart as all of us. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
